name: pagy-blocker
description: High-performance ad blocker using Chrome's declarativeNetRequest API with per-domain controls

scripts.build: npm run precompile && npm run lint
scripts.dev: npm run precompile && echo 'Development build ready - load extension in chrome://extensions/'
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run analyze-performance
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.release: npm run validate && npm run build && echo 'Release build ready!'

author: Pagy Team
